resources.string: Use machine learning to recognize single notes and improve the accuracy of single note recognition.
Follow a music piece that uses only one note at the same time.
Follow a music piece that uses only one note at the same time and turn the page when the end of the sheet is close.
Multiple simultaneous note recognition with ML
Recognize multiple notes played at the same time using Machine Learning. If a method without Machine learning is possible, it will be incorporated as a previous step
Follow a music piece that uses more than one note at the same time.
Follow a music piece that uses more than one note at the same time and turn the page when the end of the current sheet is close.
